message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will bring you significant value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.
Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for what this product offers.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,000?
